intro: A brand-new fusion of RPG and Roguelite strategy auto-battler! In the world of the Spellbook, mix and match to your heart's content and enjoy endless combat.
description:
Start with your Weapon – each one signals a distinct class path with its own unique skills! Combine the same or different classes to unlock powerful Synergies! Wield the savage fury of Warriors, command the entwined light and shadow of Priests, unleash the arcane destruction of Mages, master the shadows with the Rogues' Guild, ride the wind with the Rangers' Alliance, or stand firm with the unbreakable Paladins…
Recruit 8 adventurers, each with their own flair. Freely equip over 60 weapons, 40+ gear sets, and hundreds of artifacts, blessings, and synergy nodes to craft your one-of-a-kind build!
Diverse starting strategies, random events between fights, and constant choices make every run uniquely challenging!
Once your magical journey begins, formidable Bosses lie in wait throughout the endless adventure. Face them, defeat them, and seize the glory and rewards worthy of a true adventurer!
